variable.name: sv_maxpitch
variable.description: server-side variable for setting maximum of view angles

value.integer: By default, in quakeworld maximum viewangle is '80'. You can set for example '90' then you will be able look directly to sky. q3 players should like it

variable.remarks: EZQuake and ZQuake (may be some other) clients understand this physics change, old clients will be clamped at [-70~80] (quakeworld default) view angles.
